message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in my product. I'm offering it to you at $18,000. I believe it offers tremendous value, even at that price.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm confident that's a price we can both be happy with.
Bob, I appreciate your counter, but $10,000 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $15,000? This product will really exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I'm confident that's a price we can both be happy with.
